SageTVPlugin.Name: Enable/Disable Favorites
SageTVPlugin.Description: Allows series favorites to be enabled and disabled without removing them.
SageTVPlugin.Author: skiingwiz
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Moved to V9 Repository
1.3.2 - Moved downloads to BinTray. Removed dependency on configuration plugin.
1.3.1 - Moved downloads from Google Code to Source Forge
1.3 - Updates for SageTV 7.1
1.2 - Fix typo in default for Disabled Favorite Color
- Remove version number from stvi file
1.1 - Update to allow GUI configuration of STVi properties
1.0 - Initial Release for STV7
